Can't say yet!

Front-end build for The BIO Agency

For a large financial client, as part of a team of two (and occasionally three) we built out front-end templates for the showpiece pages of a new marketing site.

Interesting features I built included the global mobile and desktop navigation, which included a country/language picker and a three level hierarchical mega menu, the homepage hero module with conigurable clickable hotspots and a before / after image slider widget which used canvas to display the images, as DOM elements weren't going to work with the design.
